articles.content: This stunning image from the James Webb Space Telescope, brought to you by NASA, ESA, and CSA, showcases the spiral galaxy NGC 2090 in the constellation Columba. Captured using data from Webb's MIRI … [+195 chars]

articles.title: Scientists Calculated How Much Meat You Can Sustainably Eat in a Week - ScienceAlert
articles.description: When it comes to eating meat, it sometimes seems impossible to strike a balance between doing the right thing for your body, and for the planet.
